00051 static void initData(ModifierData *md)
00052 {
00053     LatticeModifierData *lmd = (LatticeModifierData*) md;
00054     lmd->strength = 1.0f;
00055 }
00056 
00057 static void copyData(ModifierData *md, ModifierData *target)
00058 {
00059     LatticeModifierData *lmd = (LatticeModifierData*) md;
00060     LatticeModifierData *tlmd = (LatticeModifierData*) target;
00061 
00062     tlmd->object = lmd->object;
00063     BLI_strncpy(tlmd->name, lmd->name, sizeof(tlmd->name));
00064 }
00065 
00066 static CustomDataMask requiredDataMask(Object *UNUSED(ob), ModifierData *md)
00067 {
00068     LatticeModifierData *lmd = (LatticeModifierData *)md;
00069     CustomDataMask dataMask = 0;
00070 
00071     /* ask for vertexgroups if we need them */
00072     if (lmd->name[0]) dataMask |= CD_MASK_MDEFORMVERT;
00073 
00074     return dataMask;
00075 }
00076 
00077 static int isDisabled(ModifierData *md, int UNUSED(userRenderParams))
00078 {
00079     LatticeModifierData *lmd = (LatticeModifierData*) md;
00080 
00081     return !lmd->object;
00082 }
00083 
00084 static void foreachObjectLink(
00085                           ModifierData *md, Object *ob,
00086        void (*walk)(void *userData, Object *ob, Object **obpoin),
00087           void *userData)
00088 {
00089     LatticeModifierData *lmd = (LatticeModifierData*) md;
00090 
00091     walk(userData, ob, &lmd->object);
00092 }
00093 
00094 static void updateDepgraph(ModifierData *md, DagForest *forest,
00095                         struct Scene *UNUSED(scene),
00096                         Object *UNUSED(ob),
00097                         DagNode *obNode)
00098 {
00099     LatticeModifierData *lmd = (LatticeModifierData*) md;
00100 
00101     if (lmd->object) {
00102         DagNode *latNode = dag_get_node(forest, lmd->object);
00103 
00104         dag_add_relation(forest, latNode, obNode,
00105                          DAG_RL_DATA_DATA | DAG_RL_OB_DATA, "Lattice Modifier");
00106     }
00107 }
00108 
00109 static void deformVerts(ModifierData *md, Object *ob,
00110                         DerivedMesh *derivedData,
00111                         float (*vertexCos)[3],
00112                         int numVerts,
00113                         int UNUSED(useRenderParams),
00114                         int UNUSED(isFinalCalc))
00115 {
00116     LatticeModifierData *lmd = (LatticeModifierData*) md;
00117 
00118 
00119     modifier_vgroup_cache(md, vertexCos); /* if next modifier needs original vertices */
00120     
00121     lattice_deform_verts(lmd->object, ob, derivedData,
00122                          vertexCos, numVerts, lmd->name, lmd->strength);
00123 }
00124 
00125 static void deformVertsEM(
00126                       ModifierData *md, Object *ob, struct BMEditMesh *editData,
00127        DerivedMesh *derivedData, float (*vertexCos)[3], int numVerts)
00128 {
00129     DerivedMesh *dm = derivedData;
00130 
00131     if (!derivedData) dm = CDDM_from_BMEditMesh(editData, ob->data, FALSE, FALSE);
00132 
00133     deformVerts(md, ob, dm, vertexCos, numVerts, 0, 0);
00134 
00135     if (!derivedData) dm->release(dm);
00136 }
